Bio:

Sreekanth is currently a Research Scientist at Jio Platforms Limited. He has completed his Ph.D. thesis with Dr. Maunendra Sankar Desarkar on Towards Event Recommendation using Social Media: Content Identification, Characterization, and Future Popularity Estimation. His thesis primarily focuses on developing machine learning models for analyzing social media texts and events.

Research Interests:

  • Natural language Understanding
  • Social Network Analysis

Current Affiliation: Research Scientist at Jio Platforms Limited
